message.entry: The first argument of the Subscriber constructor uses the wrong type, {0}. Use a ros.Node object as the first argument. For more information, see the ros.Subscriber help topic.
Unable to create a subscriber with topic name {0} and type {1}.
An error occurred while shutting down the subscriber.
Too many or too few input arguments. For more information, see the ros.Subscriber help topic.
The function did not receive any data and timed out.
